cause.description:
This is in collaboration with a non-profit organization called Harambee Centre. The funding goes to Ugandan Orphans to help them with education, food, shelter etc. Please help these Ugandan Orphans!
1. Fight against HIV/AIDs
2. Fight Poverty
3. Fight injustice
cause.mission: Help Ugandan Orphans fight against HIV/AIDS and poverty
cause.name: Ugandan Orphans with HIV/AIDS
